page.title: 07ONE DAY IN ROSIE'S LIFE : 2
page.content:
After playing cricket in the yard, the first afternoon lesson is Craft. I am enjoying weaving. At playtime I change into a policeman's uniform for my part in the school play which is to be rehearsed.
When school is over at 3.30, I wait for my Mum to drive me home, when I have a drink of tea. I play with the dog before Dad comes home from Maltby market where he has a refrigerated butcher's shop. I help Dad wash trays and make beef-burgers.
When we have had tea, I help Dad feed the bulls, the Limousan heifers and the horse. After that I have a bath and watch television before going to my comfortable bed.
